summary: When eighth grade cool guy Hiromi transfers from Tokyo to a small elementary/middle school with only six kids enrolled, wholesome and honest Soyo becomes enthralled with his sophisticated world.
cast: Kaho|Masaki Okada|Elisa Yanagi|Shôko Fujimura|Yui Natsukawa|Kôichi Satô|Hiromasa Hirosue|Syougo Morishita
keywords: schoolgirl|teenage girl|japanese teenager|japanese schoolgirl|based on comic
title: Tennen kokekkô
